title: If someone else opens my Apple Watch, that I left at home, will my phone alert me? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your Apple Watch should be locked with a passcode so that nobody but you can use it. When you enable the passcode on your Apple Watch, the device will require the passcode whenever: Your Apple Watch rebootsYou manually lock your Apple WatchYou remove your Apple Watch from your wristTo turn this feature on, on your iPhone open the Watch app, then go to My Watch > Passcode and turn it on. Read more about it here: Why you should be using a passcode on your Apple Watch

Thanks for the A2A. No, you will not get notified on your iPhone if someone else opens your Apple Watch that you left at home. That’s why it requires a passcode to unlock the Watch. Does someone at home know the passcode to unlock it? If so (and if you don’t want them using your Apple Watch), change your passcode!
